#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleDistanceOnGreen.

== Name ==

HoleDistanceOnGreen (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleDistanceOnGreen (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Distance from edge of green. From attribute specify which edge the distance is measured from.
				Unit attribute can be used to specify alternate unit system such as 'paces'.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  
            *from = [SOrientationEnum OrientationEnum.html]*
          >LengthWithUnits</...>
}}}
----
          

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| [SOrientationEnum golfml:OrientationEnum] || `from` ||  Edge of green the distance is taken from. ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== from ====

      
						Edge of green the distance is taken from.
						Mandatory since it is not possible to determinite which where the distance is taken from without this information.
					
=====  Type: =====

          [SOrientationEnum golfml:OrientationEnum]
=====  Use: =====
        required
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHolePlacementWithDistances HolePlacementWithDistances]
----
